atom

Class HBanalysis

  • java.lang.Object
    • atom.HBanalysis
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    HBanalysisMD

    public class HBanalysis
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for hydrogen bond analysis.
    Since:
    Sindo 3.6
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Kiyoshi Yagi

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HBanalysis()
      Constructs with default settings: r(DA) = 3.5 Angs, a(A...D-H)=20.0 degree.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void calcHB()
      Calculates the HB patterns for given donor/acceptor set of atoms.

      Returns the angle for the current atoms.

      Returns the r(A...H) for the current atoms.

      Returns the r(D...A) for the current atoms.

      Judge if atoms D and A are hydrogen bonded.

      Judge if atoms D-H and A are hydrogen bonded.

      Sets the acceptor atoms
      void setDonorAtoms(Atom[][] donors)

      void setHBangle(double angle)
      Set the hydrogen bond angle (H-D..A angle)
      void setHBdistance(double distance)
      Set the hydrogen bond distance
      void setHBinVMD()
      Sets the definition of HB in VMD (angle = 180.0 - DHA).
      void unsetHBinVMD()
      Unsets the definition of HB in VMD (angle = 180.0 - DHA)

      • setHBdistance

        public void setHBdistance(double distance)
        Set the hydrogen bond distance
        Parameters:
        distance - the HB distance in Angs

      • setHBangle

        public void setHBangle(double angle)
        Set the hydrogen bond angle (H-D..A angle)
        Parameters:
        angle - the HB angle in degree

      • setDonorAtoms

        public void setDonorAtoms(Atom[][] donors)
        Sets the donor atoms
        Parameters:
        donors - [0] Donor Atom, [1] Hydrogen Atom

        public void setAcceptorAtoms(Atom[] acceptors)
        Sets the acceptor atoms
        Parameters:
        acceptors - acceptor atoms

      • setHBinVMD

        public void setHBinVMD()
        Sets the definition of HB in VMD (angle = 180.0 - DHA). Default is false.

      • unsetHBinVMD

        public void unsetHBinVMD()
        Unsets the definition of HB in VMD (angle = 180.0 - DHA)

      • isHB

        public boolean isHB(Atom[] D,
                    Atom A)
        Judge if atoms D and A are hydrogen bonded.
        Parameters:
        D - [0] Donor atom, [1] Hydrogen atom
        A - Acceptor atom
        Returns:
        True if hydrogen bonded

      • isHB

        public boolean isHB(Atom D,
                    Atom H,
                    Atom A)
        Judge if atoms D-H and A are hydrogen bonded.
        Parameters:
        D - Donor atom
        H - Hydrogen atom
        A - Acceptor atom
        Returns:
        True if hydrogen bonded

        Returns:

        Returns the r(A...H) for the current atoms.
        Returns:
        rAH in bohr

      • getAngle

        public double getAngle()
        Returns the angle for the current atoms. (A...D-H or D-H...A)
        Returns:
        the angle in degree
